abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism of dual stack hosts using atechnique called 'Bump-in-the-API'(BIA) which allows for the hosts tocommunicate with other IPv6 hosts using existing IPv4 applications. Thegoal of this mechanism is the same as that of the Bump-in-the-stackmechanism [BIS], but this mechanism provides the translation methodbetween the IPv4 APIs and IPv6 APIs. Thus, the goal is simply achievedwithout IP header translation.
